catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 471
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed: Buddha seated cross-legged on lotus platform with PL hand open in lap and PR hand giving an O symbol; two halos and a beaded cloud above head; surrounded on two sides by figures playing instruments floating on clouds; two figures on either side, one praying, the other offering an object; dark background with small Bodhisattva figures
inscription:
Inscription and Seal

LRC, partially obscured by frame
medium: Woodblock print; ink on paper with hand-applied color and gold
title: Welcoming Descent of Amida and Twenty Five Bodhisattvas
